Case_ID.description: Unique identifier for each patient case.

Tumor/Normal.description: Indicates whether the sample is tumor tissue or normal tissue.

Age.description: Age of the patient in years.

BMI.description: Body Mass Index of the patient, calculated as weight in kilograms divided by height in meters squared.

Race.description: The race of the patient as self-reported or recorded.

Ethnicity_Self_Identify.description: The ethnicity of the patient as self-identified.

Tumor_Site.description: The anatomical site of the tumor within the organ or region sampled.

Tumor_Site_Other.description: Free text description of the tumor site when 'Other' is selected in Tumor_Site.

Tumor_Size_cm.description: The size of the tumor measured in centimeters.

Tumor_Focality.description: The focality of the tumor, indicating whether the tumor is unifocal or multifocal.

Histologic_Type.description: The histologic type of the tumor, describing the microscopic composition of the tumor cells.

Grade.description: The grade of the tumor, indicating the degree of differentiation or aggressiveness of the tumor cells.

Tumor_Stage_Pathological.description: The pathological stage of the tumor, indicating the extent of tumor spread based on pathological examination.

Path_Stage_Primary_Tumor_pT.description: The pathological primary tumor (pT) stage, describing the size and extent of the primary tumor.

Path_Stage_Reg_Lymph_Nodes_pN.description: Pathological stage of regional lymph nodes (pN) indicating the extent of spread to regional lymph nodes.
